name: Brobit in Virusland
description:
Brobit is the last surviving bit of data in the mainframe!  Help him make it though the virus-laden computer and save the CPU from destruction!  Only Brobit can save the day!

Brobit gets around the computer by transmitting himself to nodes.  Aim the reticle in the direction you want Brobit to go, and send him off!  

CONTROLS:

Keyboard: 

A / D - Rotate crosshairs

Enter - Shoot Brobit

Controller: 

Left Analog - Rotate crosshairs

A - Shoot Brobit

Made in about 4 days as part of the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #15.  All assets, music, sound effects, and programming were done by me.  

Enjoy! 

See more of my projects in development at studioprimitive.net!

**KNOWN BUGS**

There is an issue where Brobit sticks to corners and sometimes walls.  It seems to happen at seams where the red and blue walls come together.  If it bugs out, Brobit will just destroy himself after a bit and you can keep playing.
